title: Poraale Lyrics Annakodiyum Kodiveeranum Songs Lyrics,
stanzas:
Singer:S. P. B. Charan, Manasi MM
Song:Poraaley
Lyrics:Gangai Amaran
Movie: Annakodiyum Kodiveeranum
Music:G.V.Prakash Kumar

 .
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Poraaley .. poraaley
ye enna vittu annakodithaan poraaley
poraaley .. poraaley..
ye kanna katti kaatula vittu poraaley

Ada onnumey puriyalaye
ulagamum theriyalaye
en kannellaam neerkudamaai
yedhum kaanavum udayalaye
idhudhaan en porappa
idhudhaan un poruppa
manasu yeriyudhamma
aerikkum sudu neruppa

poraaley.. poraaley ..
ye enna vittu annakodithaan poraaley

Mansaara mugam paarthom
manasukulla vedha vedhachom
annai poda mudiyaama
aayaiellaam thorandhu vachom

Indha kaadellaam medellaam
kaal thadatha padhichivachi
karattu vazhi iruttu vazhi
kandapadi thirinju vandhom

Oru raathiriyum thoongunadha
namakoru kadhaiyum illa
ada raapagala theriyavilla
namakadhu pudhsumilla

adhellaam palaya kadha
adha ne yen maranndha
azhaiyaa alayuraney
adiye yen parandha

Ponaalum pogaliye
en nenpilum neethaan
nizhalilum neethaan maaralaye
oh .oh ....

Oru nodiyum oru pozhudhum
un nenapa olichadhilla
oru yugamaa palayugamaa
urava aththu thavichadhilla

Idhil yaaroda kannu pattu
prinjadhu namma pazhi
idhu vidhiyoda vizhayaatil
vidindhadhu periya pazhi

Yen vedhanaya eduthu sonnaa
mayilum azhugumadi
andha saami idha kettu sonna
unnakum priyumadi

Usurum nadungudhaiyaa
unna nenachapadi
iva un annakodi
poraa vera vazhi

poraaley .. poraaley
ye enna vittu annakodithaan poraaley

Ada onnumey puriyalaye
ulagamum sariyillaye
en kannellaam neerkudamaai
adha kaanavum mudiyalaye
idhudhaan en porappu
idhudhaan un poruppu
manasu eriyudhaiyaa
enna suthum sudu neruppu English Translation
I tried my best :)
